name: Coloring App
description:
An interactive coloring book, where the SVG's white areas are converted to paintable spaces that can be filled with a variety of colors and patterns. In addition to various painting tools, users can undo/redo their most recent action, clear the entire image to the original state, download/save the image, and print.

Synced with Disney Interactive's internal CMS configuration options, so that the images, internationalized text translations, colors & tool types can be customizable and programmable.

Utilizes SVG's to create a responsive, dynamic coloring surface that capitalizes on Disney's plethora of publishing content, and brings the physical coloring book into the digital space.
